籧字的基本解释

籧
qú
〔籧篨（
ch?）〕用竹或苇编的粗席，如“若簟籧籧。”

籧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qú］
［《廣韻》强魚切，平魚，羣。］
(1)见“籧篨”。
(2)通“筥”。圆形的竹器。参见“籧筐”。

籧字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　籧； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页905第24
【廣韻】强魚切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】求於切，?音渠。【說文】籧篨，麤竹席也。【揚子·方言】簟，麤者謂之籧篨，或謂之籧筁。　又醜疾名。【晉語】籧篨不可使俯。蓋編席爲囷，如人之擁腫而不能俯，故以名之。　又【正韻】居許切，音舉。【禮·月令】季春之月，具曲植籧筐。【註】亦作筥，養蠶器也。

籧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
籧字的起名意思

暂无。

crude bamboo mat
Basic explanation of words
crude bamboo mat
qú
〔籧篨(
ch?)] A thick mat made of bamboo or reeds, such as "Ruoyanyan."
crude bamboo mat
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qú］
["Guangyun" strong fish cut, flat fish, group. ]
(1) See "籧篨".
(2) Through "Yun". Round bamboo ware. See "Sai basket".
crude bamboo mat
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　籧; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 905 24
[Guang Yun] Strong fish cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Seek to cut,? Yin Qu. [Said the text] 籧篨, thick bamboo mats. [Yangtze Dialect] 簟, the thick one is called Zhi籧篨, or called Zhi籧筁.　An ugly name. [Jin dialect] You can't overwhelm 籧篨. The mats are built as huddles, like a person's swelling and cannot be bowed down, so it is named after it.　[Zheng Yun] Ju Xu Qi, sound citation. 【Rite·Moon Order】The month of Jichun, with a tune and planting a basket. [Note] It is also used for sericulture and silkworm rearing.
crude bamboo mat
